attributes.action: Hold a general election when/if he stands down before the end of his term in office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When I vote in a general election I am not in principal voting for a local MP but for a party and leader to make the big decisions that will affect this country over the next 4/5 years!

If Tony Blair wishes to end his term in office early then the country should be able to go to the polls to vote for the party/leader for a new term in office.

To think that we could end up with someone making big decisions on our behalf when they have not been asked to do the job by those that matter most in a democracy is a joke!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
